titles.title: Expressing the sense of the Congress to support an increase in funds allocated to the Republic of Haiti and to expedite the delivery of emergency aid to the island nation because of the terrible destruction brought on by Hurricane Jeanne.

Expressing the sense of the Congress to support an increase in funds allocated to the Republic of Haiti and to expedite the delivery of emergency aid to the island nation because of the terrible destruction brought on by Hurricane Jeanne.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.

bill.summary: Supports increased funding and expedited emergency assistance for Haiti because of the terrible destruction caused by Hurricane Jeanne.
